cards.rules_text:
When Tanboku enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Whenever an artifact or enchantment is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its controller gains 2 life.

When Naruko enters, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
Whenever Naruko attacks, scry 1.
When Konoha enters, search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card. Put it onto the battlefield tapped, then return a land you control to its owner's hand.

cards.rules_text: Whenever Kasumi enters or attacks, you may put a creature from your hand onto the battlefield. It's an Illusion in addition to its other types. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Ward–Pay 3 life.
Whenever Megumi attacks, choose up to one creature defending player controls. It gets -1/-1 until end of turn and must block Megumi this turn if able.

Lifelink
When Mikoto enters, if she was cast, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card with mana value 4, then put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do the same for mana value 3 and mana value 2.

When Miyo and Tsubame enters, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Whenever Miyo and Tsubame attacks, name a card type, then reveal the top card of your library. If the revealed card has the chosen type, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature.

Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

Menace

At the beginning of the next end step, you choose one – That player discards two cards; or that player sacrifices a creature; or that player sacrifices a land.

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
